error.message: Class Drupal\layout_builder_kit\Plugin\Block\LBKBaseComponent extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginTrait instead.

Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
